[event]
# to Solitary River
type=event
location=38,28,1,4
activate=on_trigger
hotspot=location
intermap=maps/07_solitary_river.txt,30,29
tooltip=Solitary River

[event]
# Cave wind sound effect
type=event
location=0,0,1,1
activate=on_load
soundfx=soundfx/environment/cave_wind_loop.ogg

[npc]
# Krolan
type=npc
location=6,12,1,1
filename=npcs/krolan.txt
requires_not_status=sq_krolan_travel
requires_status=sq_krolan_init
